57534.「……<pc>さん 今の話 私も聞いたわ。:
I heard what he just said too,
<pc>...

57535.「……おじさん くわしく聞かせて。\n きらきらした本を持った サダクは\n い:
Hey, tell me. Where did Sadak go with that
diary?

57536.「あ あぁ……？\n アイツなら 少しの間 酒場にいただけだぜ。\n どこに行っ:
H... huh? He was only here at the tavern
for a little bit. After that, no idea where
he went.

57537.「そ そういや リンジャの塔の場所を聞かれて\n 教えてやったら すぐ出ていった:
A...actually... he asked me where Linja Tower
was, and I told him... he left right away.
That's probably where he's headed...

57538.「そう……ありがと。\n これで あの インチキ霊媒師を\n 呪ってやれるわ……:
Got it... thanks. Now I can expose that phony
medium...

57539.「……ところで その葉っぱ なんなの？: By the way... what is that?

57540.「おう こいつぁ きつけそうっていってな！\n ベロベロに酔っぱらった時でも\n:
Oh, this? It's called Softwort! Even if you
get super smashed, one of these'll perk you
right up!

57541.「……ふぅん。\n 後から 薬で治そうとするくらいなら\n そもそも飲まなきゃい:
Hmm... I'd feel like an idiot to drink and
just take medicine right after.

57542.「私 姉さんの日記を盗んだ サダクを追って\n リンジャの塔まで 行ってみるわ。:
I'm going to Linja Tower so I can track down
Sadak and the diary. I'd really appreciate
if you could come with me.

57543.「リンジャの塔は セレドット山道を北に進んで\n リンジャハル海岸の 遺跡を抜け:
You can get there by heading north from the
Celedot Mountain Pass, and then it's just past
the coast ruins. I'll see you there.

57545.「これは 黒仮面どの。\n 私のような者のため ご足労いただけるとは\n このサ:
So you're the Black Mask! For someone such
as yourself to meet with me, I am deeply
humbled.

57548.「おぉ……これが あの祈願の魔像。\n なんと 素晴らしい……。:
Oh... so this is that Prayer Statue...
How wonderful...

57549.「……計画は 順調なのか？: How is the plan coming along?

57550.「町の連中は 完全に手中に収めました。\n あとは 最後の仕上げにかかるだけです:
The townsfolk are completely under my
control. All that's left is to put the
finishing touches.

57551.「この像に 町の大人どもが 祈りを捧げれば\n その祈りのチカラで セレドの町一:
If the adults pray to this statue, their
prayers will cause all of Celed to completely
erode into the false world.

57552.「自分たちが どうなる運命かも知らずに\n 奴らは すっかり私を 信じ切っていま:
They all completely trust me without any idea
of what's in store for them... Heh heh heh...

57554.「これは 私のジャマをしようとする\n 人間の小娘が 持っていた物で なんでも\:
It belonged to this annoying little human
girl... it mentioned something about the
false world, I think...

57555.「万が一を考えて 奪っておきましたが\n 誰も あの小娘のことなど 信じています:
I took it just to be safe, but I doubt anyone
would believe her anyways. It matters not.

57556.「……ジャマな物なら さっさと始末しておけ。: If it's a problem, then get rid of it. Now.

57559.「……どんなに ささいなことでも\n 不安の芽は 早めに つみとることだ。\n:
Any signs of worry you must nip in the bud
immediately, no matter how small. You
mustn't underestimate humans.

57560.「……ふん！ 人間ごときを 恐れるなんて\n まったく 器の小さい おくびょう者:
Hmph! You're really afraid of what humans can
do? Ridiculous...

57561.「これさえあれば 計画は成ったも同然。\n そして 偽りの世界の侵食を果たせば\:
With this statue, my plan is as good as gold.
Once the erosion into the false world is
complete, this world will be at my mercy...

57562.「ククッ……。\n では 最後の仕上げといきますか！:
Heh heh... it's time for the finishing
touches!

57563.「私と 姉さんの……\n たったひとつの絆だったのに……。:
That diary was... the only thing that kept us
connected...

57564.「サダクが 魔物と通じていたなんて……。\n このままだと 町が危ないわ。\n:
To think Sadak is in league with a monster...
Everyone will be in danger if we don't do
something. We have to tell everyone!

57565.「……私 急いで戻るから\n <pc>さんも\n セレドの町まで 来てちょうだい:
I'll be heading back now, so I'll see you
when you get there.

57567.「……皆さん。あれから ぼくは旅に出て\n この町が救われる方法を 探してきまし:
Welcome back. Since last time, I've been on a
journey to find a way to save the town. Now,
please turn your attention to this statue.

57568.「霊を呼びだし 話を聞いてもらうには\n 祈りのチカラが必要……。この祈願の魔像:
In order to summon the spirits here, you must
show the power of prayer... now, please pray
to this Prayer Statue!

57569.「像が 祈りのチカラで 満たされれば\n 悪霊と化した 子供たちの 恨みを消し去:
If the statue is filled with your prayers,
it will extinguish the children's grudges,
and they shall return here...

57575.「……クハハハハッ！！\n 人の心をあやつるなど たやすいものよ！:
Keh heh heh heh! How easy it is to toy with
the hearts of people!

57576.「セレドの町は 偽りの世界に侵食される！\n そうなれば この世界の者は\n す:
Celed will become one with the false world!
All that's left of this world will be
extinguished!

57584.「人間の小娘め……。\n どこまでも 私のジャマをするというか……！:
You little brat...! How many times will you
interfere with my plans?!

57590.「クックックッ…… 逃げてもムダよ……。\n 祈願の魔像のチカラを使えば いつで:
Keh heh heh! Run all you like! With the
statue's power, I can bring about the false
world with ease!

57592.「また来たか <cs_pchero>よ！\n 二度と 戻れぬように\n カタチも:
There you are again, <cs_pchero>! I'll
cut you into little pieces so you'll never
come back!

57594.「だが ただでは死なぬ！！\n 小娘ッ！ せめて 貴様だけでもっ……！:
I won't let my death be in vain!
You're coming with me, little girl!!

57596.「に 人間を……甘く見ていたか……。\n ぬかっ……たわ……。:
I guess I... really did underestimate...
You humans...

57599.「いや…… 突き飛ばした時に\n お前のヒジが みぞおちに入ってな……。:
Don't worry... when I pushed you, you elbowed
me right in the stomach...

57601.「サダクが死んで 祈願の魔像も壊れたおかげで\n 光の河も 元の姿に戻ったみたい:
Looks like the River of Light's all back to
normal now...

57602.「サダクは 大人たちの心を利用して\n 姉さんたちがいる 死の世界で\n こちら:
Sadak tried to use the hearts of the adults
to try to join both this world and the other
world together...

57603.「……<cs_pchero>さん あなたのおかげで\n この町は 救われました。:
You have saved this town from a terrible fate.
Thank you, from the bottom of my heart.

57604.「私が あの男の正体を見抜けなかったせいで\n 取り返しのつかない事態を\n 引:
My failure to see that man for what he really
was almost caused horrible consequences...

57607.「……まだ 侵食は続いているんだわ！\n パパ！ 急いで 町のみんなを\n ダー:
...the erosion must still be going on! Dad, we
have to hurry and get everyone to safety at
the Abbey!

57608.「すべて 終わったのではなかったのかっ！？\n だ だが お前がそう言うのなら…:
I thought you said it was over?! But, if you
insist... I will tell everyone!

57609.「<cs_pchero>さん 悪いけど\n 一緒に 来てくれない？\n あなたに:
Sorry to ask again, but can you come with
me? I want you to be there to see it, too...

57610.「……それじゃ ダーマ神殿の\n 礼拝堂で 待ってるわね。:
I'll be waiting in the chapel in the Alltrades
Abbey.

57611.「ふむ。ここまで来れば もう大丈夫だな。:
Good. Looks like everyone's here and
accounted for.

57612.「……ごめんなさい パパ。\n 侵食が続いてるというのは ウソよ。:
Dad, I'm sorry... about the erosion...
That was a lie.

57613.「ダーマ神殿まで みんなを連れてきたのは\n 別の目的があったの。\n きっと:
I brought you all here for another reason.
This might be our last chance...

57614.「……みんな 思いだして。\n 昔は毎日 私たち子供を迎えに\n この礼拝堂まで:
Do you all remember when you used to come
here every day to pick us all up?

57615.「姉さんたちは いつか 大人たちが\n 迎えにきてくれると信じて\n 毎日 ダー:
The children pray here every day, hoping that
one day the adults will come back for them...

57619.「サダクは 本当のことも言ってたのよ。\n 祈りのチカラを利用して 私たちがいる:
Sadak was telling the truth. He wanted to use
the power of prayer to join this world and
that world together.

57620.「祈願の魔像の影響が残ってる 今なら\n ふたつの世界が重なって 死んだ姉さんた:
Since that statue is still working, I thought
that the two worlds would be joined together
and I'd have this one chance to see her...

57624.「……お前を失って以来 私は ずっと ひとりで\n 思い悩んでいたよ。私の 厳し:
Ever since I lost you, I've felt so alone in
my own head... Did my strict discipline push
you too far...?

57625.「守ってやれなかっただけでなく\n 心細い思いまで させていたとは……\n 情け:
Not only did I fail to protect you, but I also
made you feel so helpless... I'm sorry... I've
failed you as a father...

57626.「これは いつの日か\n お前の墓に供えようと 用意していた物だ。\n 受け取っ:
I was hoping to offer this at your grave
someday. Please... will you take it?

57627.「ずっと ルコリアと一緒だったお前が\n あの世で さびしくないようにと思ってな:
You had been with Lucolia for so long... I
didn't want you to feel lonely...

57629.「私……あれから パパと同じように\n みんなを まとめるようになって\n パパ:
When I started keeping everyone together
just like you did, I realized how hard it
really was for you...

57630.「許してほしいのは 私の方よ。\n いつもワガママばかり言って 迷惑かけたまま\:
I'm the one who should be asking for
forgiveness. I was always so selfish, and
caused so much trouble... I'm sorry.

57631.「私たち 大人に追い詰められたなんて\n 思ってないわ。だから 自分を責めないで:
We don't feel suffocated by the adults... so
don't blame yourselves. Please take care of
mom and Lucolia for me...

57632.「ルコリア……ひさしぶりね。\n 離ればなれになってから ずっと\n あなたのこ:
It's been so long, Lucolia... I've been
worried sick about you since we were
separated...

57633.「姉さん……。\n 私 生まれた時から ずっとそばにいて\n 何もかも 姉さんに:
You've always been by my side since we were
born, and I did depend on you for everything,
but...

57634.「もう ひとりでも やっていけるわ。\n これからは 姉さんがいなくても 大丈夫:
I think I'll be just fine on my own now.
Thank you... for everything...

57635.「あり…とう ルコ…ア……。\n それを聞いて 安心…て\n この世を 去…こと:
Th..ank... yo... Lu..ia...
I'm so glad... to hear... I can...
...finally leave... with peace of mind...

57636.「次 生…れてくる時も また……\n あなたと……:
In the... next life... we'll be...
...together...

57638.「……ルコリア。お前のおかげで\n また リゼロッタに会うことができた。:
Lucolia... thanks to you, we were able to see
Lieselotte again.

57639.「今まで ちゃんと お前と向き合おうとせず\n やりきれない思いを ぶつけてばか:
I'm sorry that I haven't been true to you, and
for all the times I lashed out at you with
my own problems.

57640.「……やつあたりしてたのは お互い様だし\n そんなの 今さら 言いっこなしよ。:
We've both been taking it out on each other...
But let's just forget about all that.

57641.「私 今まで パパに逆らってばかりだったけど\n 魔物から守ってくれて うれしか:
I know that I've disobeyed you, but I am happy
you protected me from that monster. Thanks,
dad...

57642.「……<pc>さん。私たちが こうして\n 姉さんたちと会うことができたのも\n:
<pc>... it's thanks to that diary
that we were able to see Lieselotte again.

57643.「セレドの町だけじゃなく 私たちの心も\n 救ってくれた あなたに\n どうすれ:
You've saved not only the town, but everyone's
hearts, too... how could we ever repay you?

57644.「そういうことでしたら 町全体を代表して\n 私から お礼をさせていただきましょ:
In that case... I'd like to thank you on
behalf of everyone in this town. Please,
take this.

57645.「また セレドの町まで お越しの際は\n 我が家に 寄っていってください。\n:
If you're ever in town again, please feel free
to stop by. I'm sure Lucolia would be more
than happy to see you again, too.

57647.ブラト町長は ルコリアと\n町の大人たちを連れて 町に戻っていった。:
Burat returned to town with Lucolia and the
rest of the adults.

81793.集会所の中は 安らぐ香りで\n満たされている……。:
Inside of the meeting place, a soothing aroma
wafted in the air...

81794.「さあ この像にかしずき 祈りましょう！\n そして 呼びだした子供たちの霊に\:
Now, I ask you to bow down to this statue and
pray! Ask the children for your forgiveness,
and you shall all be saved!

81796.「ダメな親で ごめんなさい……。: I'm sorry I was such a bad parent...

81797.「オレたちのことは 忘れて\n 安らかに眠ってくれ……。:
Just forget about us, and please rest in
peace...

81798.「その身が消え去るとも 知らぬまま\n 自らの祈りによって 滅するがよい！:
Perish by your own prayers, not knowing that
you will disappear forever!

81801.「……ひいぃぃっ！？ なんだよ これ！？: W....what the hell is going on?!

81803.「おい！ 光の河……\n 光が 消えていくぞ……！:
Hey! The river of light...
Its light is fading!

81804.「よかろう！ 祈願の魔像のチカラを借り\n 貴様は 私が直接 地獄へ送ってくれる:
Very well! With this statue's power, I will
grant you a swift death to the world
beyond!

81805.「か……身体が 元に戻ったわ……。: Hey... my body's back to normal...

81808.「バケモノだ！\n みんな 早く逃げろっ！！: It's a monster! Everyone, get away, quickly!

81809.「まずは 貴様を始末してから\n ゆっくり すべてを ぬりかえてくれるわ！:
I'll take care of you first! Then, this world
shall be my canvas!
